= URW Base35 Font Family

== General

URW Base35 is a set of 35 core PostScript Level 2 fonts, released by Artifex
Software under the GPL. These fonts are based on the 35 standard PostScript fonts
that were commonly distributed with printers and publishing systems.

The font family includes:

* **C059** - Courier replacement (Regular, Bold, Italic, Bold Italic)
* **Nimbus** family (Sans, Serif, Mono)
* **URW** Bookman, Gothic
* **Standard** symbols (P052)

== Downloadable Fixture

The `urw-base35-fonts/` directory is downloaded on-demand via Rake tasks.
It is NOT committed to the repository.

To download:

[source,sh]
----
rake fixtures:download[URWBase35]
----

== Source

These fonts are from the URW Base35 fonts project:

* https://github.com/ArtifexSoftware/urw-base35-fonts
* https://www.ghostscript.com/

Version: 20230902

== Usage in Testing

These fonts are used as reference Type 1 fonts for testing Type 1 font parsing,
AFM/PFM parsing, and Type 1 to TTF conversion functionality.

The fonts are in multiple formats:
* `.afm` - Adobe Font Metrics
* `.pfm` - Printer Font Metrics
* `.pfb` / `.t1` - Type 1 font files
* `.ttf` / `.otf` - TrueType/OpenType fonts

== Test Files

The `test_*.rb` files in this directory contain integration tests that verify:

* PFM generation accuracy
* Round-trip Type 1 conversion
* Reference comparison with original fonts

These tests can be run individually:

[source,sh]
----
cd spec/fixtures/fonts/type1/urw
ruby test_pfm_generator.rb
ruby test_roundtrip_conversion.rb
ruby test_urw_reference_comparison.rb
----
